TEXT.TITLE: TERRA MINES LTD <TMEXF> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 89 cts vs loss 17 cts Net loss 13.9 mln vs loss 1,996,000 Revs 204,000 vs 2,087,000 Note: 1986 includes writedown of 12.5 mln dlrs for the costs of mineral properties and deferred exploration and development Bullmoose Lake in the Northwest Territories. Reuter
